column5: I just heard that Canada was going to be outlawing the use of lead headed jigs. Is there any trueth in this statement? I'm assuming my contact meant Ontario. I'm only interested in FACTS not hearsay. Thanks in advance for your comments, Jawjerker
[font color=green size=3][b]It has been talked about by the politicians, but has not been implemented, partly because the numbers don't prove it would have any effect.
